Codo » Index » Lemonette » TrackableRouter

Class: Lemonette.TrackableRouter

Defined in: app/scripts/application/routers/trackable_router.coffee
Inherits: Marionette.AppRouter

Overview

Base router, enable google analytics track

Examples:

Create a TrackableRouter 


class MyRouter extends App.Routers.TrackableRouter
  appRoutes:
    "myroute":  "mymethod"

  • Marionette.AppRouter
